other_tests.findings: Reticulation within both lower lobes compatible with minimal fibrotic change; normal hepatobiliary, pancreatic, splenic, and urinary assessments; small hiatal hernia; fat stranding around sigmoid colon diverticula; small amount of extraluminal air suggesting microperforation; small amount of simple pelvic free fluid.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Left adrenal nodule previously characterized as an adenoma is unchanged, measuring up to 14 mm.

other_tests.findings: MIXED BACTERIAL FLORA (>= 3 colony types), consistent with skin and/or genital contamination.
